name: Space Dungeon (itch)
description:
Alien Robot's are planning to take over the world! You must get through there dungeon and kill all the Robots! If you complete this mission you will be rewarded with a win screen. Nothing else.

Controls

WASD CONTROLS!!!

CLICK TO SHOOT!

Credits

@found4k - Programmer

Unity - Game engine

Tips:
  • Hide behind walls and shoot them by the edges!
  • Look around the maze
  • Go to training boss. (Down the ramp in the spawn room.)
Locations Social Links
